Description: Postcard; printed paper; colour photograph showing the Sphinx and Great Pyramid at Giza.
Curator's comments: Used. The sender addresses the card to Bob & Bob, and goes on to write: "It is a bit difficult getting married here and it is taking longer than I thought. Won't be in Florida before the middle of May. I guess you will be in the mountains by then enjoying the good air and earning a big bundle. Perhaps you can leave the key to the storeroom with the beauty shop lady or the garage man. I hope to see you the following winter with my husband. Many thanks for everything".
Associated places: Topographic representation of: Pyramid of Khufu
Acquisition notes: Purchased from Rick, 28th April 2013, Greenflea Market, Columbus Avenue, West 76th-77th Street, New York.
